Hello, Mark here! I was just finishing my project and testing in my cellphone, when I remember that I could add ads from google adsense because of the html. But I dont know how I can add this...well, yeah, I know that I have to add the script that adsense gave me after <head>, or after <body> if <head> is not accesible. 

So, I did this in my index.html. I put the script after <head>, immediately. But it´s not working...is there something that I can do to achieve this? Am I missing something?

Best Regards!

For adsense works only included the google code for your adsense account and works fine. Use the contact form for send me the code of your .html file please.

Thanks.
